title: Dynamic Toon Eyeball Material
description: A procedural highly parameterized and customizable eyeball material for any toon-styled character
longDescription:
1. DTE (Dynamic Toon Eyeball) is a detailed and procedural eyeball material with a toon style.
  2. Procedural rendering means the elements and layers of the eye are constructed from pure mathematical material expressions, and no texture references are used.
  3. This allows for high modularity and fitment for any character's eyeball of any size, so no pixilation regardless of scaling.
technicalDetails:
Features:

Procedural Toony Style:

Generate charming and playful toony-style eyes without the need for hand-painting or complex textures.


Eye Variations:

Easily adjust the size, shape, and overall appearance of the eyes to suit different characters and art styles.


Iris Customization:

Customize the iris color and design with a wide range of preset options or create your own unique patterns.


Pupil Options: 

Add customizable cartoon reflections to the eyes, giving them a lively and animated feel.


Glossiness and Wetness Control: 

Adjust the glossiness and wetness of the eyes to achieve a more realistic yet toony appearance.

 

 

Number of Unique Materials and Material Instances: 3


Number of Textures: 0 (Material is procedural, does not use textures)


Texture Resolutions: N/A (Material is procedural, does not use textures)


Supported Development Platforms:


  Windows: Yes


  Mac: Yes


Important/Additional Notes:

(None)
